total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of the color change in the examples. In this case, 8 changes to 4, 1, 3, and 2.
Q2: Identify the position of the color change. It seems that the color change occurs in the same shape but different location.
Q3: Identify the rule of the location change. It seems that the location change is related to the position of the shape in the grid.
Q4: Apply the color change rule to the input grid of the quiz.
Q5: Apply the location change rule to the input grid of the quiz.
Q1: Identify the pattern of the color change in the examples. In this case, 8 changes to 4, 1, 2, and 3.

Q2: Identify the rule of the color change. It seems that the color changes according to the position of the 8s. The top left group of 8s changes to 4, the top right group changes to 1, the bottom left group changes to 3, and the bottom right group changes to 2.
Q3: Apply the rule to the quiz. Identify the groups of 8s in the input grid and change their color according to their position.
